about_the_game:
Note: This DLC requires The Cenozoic Era base game & More Colors DLC to play.

DLC Description: Earth Color Pack for The Cenozoic Era

Unleash the vibrant hues of Earth's natural palette with the Natural Color Pack, a stunning new DLC for The Cenozoic Era! This downloadable content enhances your prehistoric animal with a rich selection of realistic, earthy tones.

Features:

  • True-to-Life Color Palettes: Experience the varied animals of the Cenozoic Era with newly updated, accurate color schemes for different looks– from the lush greens to the warm browns.

  • Customizable Environmental Effects: Adjust the lighting and color saturation to match different times of day, giving your prehistoric animal a dynamic, ever-changing appearance as the sun rises and sets across the landscape.

Immerse yourself in the breathtaking beauty of the Cenozoic Era and witness your characters stunning transformation through its vibrant colors. The Natural Color Pack lets you paint your animal with the richness of nature, enhancing your experience as you shape and explore the age of mammals.

name: The Cenozoic Era - Natural Color Extension Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: The Natural Color Pack for The Cenozoic Era brings the vibrant hues of Earth’s past to life! Enhance your animal with realistic, true-to-life colors with a more immersive experience of the Cenozoic Era’s stunning natural beauty.
